notes_text: Mandatory death penalty for convicted drug traffickers, legally defined as individuals possessing more than 200 g of cannabis.
notes: Mandatory death penalty for convicted drug traffickers, legally defined as individuals possessing more than 200 g of cannabis.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Malaysia}} Mandatory death penalty for convicted drug traffickers, legally defined as individuals possessing more than {{cvt|200|g|0}} of cannabis.<ref>{{citation|url=https://travel.state.gov/travel/cis_pa_tw/cis/cis_960.html |title=Malaysia |publisher=[[Bureau of Consular Affairs]] |access-date=17 February 2011 |url-status=dead |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20110217140806/http://travel.state.gov/travel/cis_pa_tw/cis/cis_960.html |archive-date=17 February 2011 }}</ref>
